data.title: indic.page/data.yml at master · knadh/indic.page
data.meta_description: A directory of Indic (Indian) language computing resources. - indic.page/data.yml at master · knadh/indic.page
data.text:
description: Shabdatharavali is the most authoritative Malayalam dictionary of the Malayalam language up to the end of the twentieth century. (Shabdataravali by Srikanteshwaram Padmanabha Pillai is considered to be the most authoritative of the Malayalam dictionaries.) This book of over 2000 pages is considered to be the last word in the meaning of Malayalam words. The first volume of the book, published in 1917, was completed in twenty years.

description: Lios is a free and open source software for converting print in to text using either scanner or a camera, It can also produce text out of scanned images from other sources such as Pdf, Image, Folder containing Images or screenshot.

description: Hyphenation is the process inserting hyphens in between the syllables of a word so that when the text is justified, maximum space is utilized.
